summary: The OpenTelemetry interceptor lacks support for tracing propagation on inbound update requests. A comprehensive review is needed to identify and implement any other missing hooks in the interceptor.
userImpact: Users cannot properly trace inbound update requests in distributed systems, limiting observability and debugging capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement tracing propagation for inbound update requests and conduct a comprehensive review of the OTel interceptor for other missing hooks.
keyQuote: The OTel interceptor currently does not support tracing propagation on inbound update requests. We need to implement it.
